None.original: What is the object opened by an agent in the kitchen after 2024-05-18T13:13:00 and before 2024-05-25T09:33:00?
None.paraphrase: What did the agent open in the kitchen after 1:13 p.m. on May 18, 2024, and before 9:33 a.m. on May 25, 2024?

Type.original: What is the type of the object poured by an agent in the kitchen from 2024-06-05T21:59:00 to 2024-07-09T23:45:00?
Type.paraphrase: What type of object did the agent pour in the kitchen from 9:59 p.m. on June 5, 2024, to 11:45 p.m. on July 9, 2024?

Superclass.original: What is the superclass of the object typed by an agent inside the livingroom for more than or equal to 10 seconds?
Superclass.paraphrase: What broad category does the object belong to that an agent typed on for at least 10 seconds in the living room?

State.original: What is the state of the object soaked by an agent in the bathroom after or at 2024-05-04T02:22:00 and before 2024-06-01T08:33:00?
State.paraphrase: Can you tell me what condition the object was in after someone soaked it in the bathroom between May 4, 2024, at 2:22 a.m. and June 1, 2024, at 8:33 a.m.?

Attribute.original: What is the attribute of the object switched on by an agent in the livingroom from 2024-04-05T15:25:00 to 2024-04-10T08:04:00?
Attribute.paraphrase: What attributes do objects have that were activated by an agent in the living room between 3:25 p.m. on April 5, 2024, and 8:04 a.m. on April 10, 2024?

Size.original: What are the width, height, and depth of the object grabbed by an agent in the bathroom after or at 2024-04-09T04:42:00 and before 2024-06-14T04:50:00?
Size.paraphrase: Can you tell me the width, height, and depth of the object that an agent picked up in the bathroom between 4:42 a.m. on April 9, 2024, and 4:50 a.m. on June 14, 2024?

None.original: What did the agent do with an object which is a subclass of Electronics in the bedroom from 2024-04-01T12:29:00 to 2024-06-01T08:52:00?
None.paraphrase: During the period from April 1, 2024, at 12:29 p.m. to June 1, 2024, at 8:52 a.m., what did the agent do with the electronic device in the bedroom?

Place.original: What is the place involving an agent that puts an object which is a subclass of Furniture after 2024-05-13T08:43:00 and before 2024-06-30T00:20:00?
Place.paraphrase: Where did the agent put a furniture after 8:43 a.m. on May 13, 2024, and before 12:20 a.m. on June 30, 2024?

3D Coordinates.original: What are the 3D spatial coordinates of the object closed by an agent from 2024-04-05T16:35:00 to 2024-05-26T18:35:00, which is a subclass of Appliances?
3D Coordinates.paraphrase: Can you tell me the 3D coordinates of the appliance that an agent closed during the period from 4:35 p.m. on April 5, 2024 to 6:35 p.m. on May 26, 2024?

Instant.original: What is the time involving an agent that soaks an object whose height is less than 0.65m in the kitchen?
Instant.paraphrase: When did that person soak something under 0.65 meters tall in the kitchen?

Interval.original: From when to when is the agent putting an object whose height is less than 0.67m in the bedroom?
Interval.paraphrase: When did the agent start and finish putting an object under 0.67 meters tall in the bedroom?

Duration.original: How long does an agent turn to an object which is a subclass of Furniture in the livingroom?
Duration.paraphrase: How long did it take for the agent to turn toward a furniture in the living room?

None.original: What is the activity involving an agent that drinks an object whose state is GRABED in the kitchen for more than 7 seconds?
None.paraphrase: Which activity is it when the agent drinks a beverage he grabbed in the kitchen for more than 7 seconds?

next/previous.original: What is the previous activity involving an agent that scrubs an object which is a subclass of Props in the livingroom after 2024-06-18T07:33:00 and before 2024-07-06T23:50:00?
next/previous.paraphrase: Which activity happened right before the agent scrubbed a prop in the living room between 7:33 a.m. on June 18, 2024, and 11:50 p.m. on July 6, 2024?

Video.original: What is the video from camera3 involving an agent that grabs an object whose attribute is has_paper at a position where the X coordinate is greater than -3.58 from 2024-04-06T04:19:00 to 2024-05-07T00:34:00?
Video.paraphrase: Which video from camera 3 shows an agent grabbing a paper object at an X coordinate greater than -3.58, recorded during the period from 4:19 a.m. on April 6, 2024 to 12:34 a.m. on May 7, 2024?

VideoFrame.original: What are the start and end frames of the scene from camera4 involving an agent that turns to an object whose attribute is has_plug at a position where the Z coordinate is less than -4.14 for less than or equal to 13 seconds?
VideoFrame.paraphrase: What are the start and end frames of the scene from camera 4 featuring an agent that turns to an object that has a plug at a position where the Z coordinate is less than -4.14 for less than or equal to 13 seconds?

2D Coordinates.original: What are the objects and their bounding boxes in the first video frame from camera1 involving an agent that texts an object which is a subclass of Props at a position where the Z coordinate is less than -5.25 for less than or equal to 14 seconds?
2D Coordinates.paraphrase: Can you tell me which objects and their bounding boxes appeared in the first video frame from camera 1, where an agent was texting with a prop at a location with a Z coordinate below -5.25, within 14 seconds?

Count.original: How many times per object does an agent read an object whose state is GRABED at a position where the X coordinate is greater than 5.46 for more than or equal to 1 seconds?
Count.paraphrase: How many times did the agent read an object that was held by the agent at a location with an X coordinate greater than 5.46 for at least one second?

Minimum.original: What is the minimum X coordinate of an object whose height is greater than 0.21m that is looked at by an agent in the livingroom?
Minimum.paraphrase: What's the smallest x-coordinate of any object taller than 0.21 m that an agent saw in the living room?

Maximum.original: Among the objects that the agent sent a message to, what is the maximum Z coordinate of an object that the agent text, whose state is ON in the bedroom?
Maximum.paraphrase: Of the devices the agent texted on, whatâ€™s the highest Z-coordinate of the ones in the bedroom that are on?

Average.original: What is the average duration involving an agent that turns to an object whose attribute is has_paper in the livingroom?
Average.paraphrase: How long, on average, did an agent turns to a paper object in the living room?

Summation.original: What is the total duration involving an agent that drinks an object whose state is CLOSED at a position where the Z coordinate is greater than -9.5?
Summation.paraphrase: How long did it take for an agent to drink a closed object at a location where the Z coordinate was above -9.5?
